text: Ugandan presidential candidate abducted by military, opposition party says - The Washington Post
fullText: Bobi Wine, the pop star-turned-politician who is contesting President Yoweri Museveni’s rule, was forced into a helicopter and flown to an unknown location as votes are tallied, his party said.

text: Trump thanks Iran for halting executions as allies discourage US from striking - AP News
